Public Schools Week for DCS continues today- even with a Snow Day! Let’s highlight Dundee Elementary School
Little Leaders Program. #publicschoolproud

Our Little Leaders program at Dundee Elementary School was established during the 2016-2017 school year. Going into that school year, our fifth grade transitioned from being a part of our middle school to our elementary school. With this realignment, we saw an opportunity to create a mentorship program where our fifth graders could take on a responsibility role and help support their fellow DES Vikings. Throughout the day, 56 fifth graders serve as Little Leaders, supporting younger learners in ways such as preparing for the start and end of the school day, during recess and lunch, and with academics.
